summary: Quick Resto - a fast restaurant finder app with online ordering
architectural_notes: Add ordering system for restaurant food delivery/pickup

existing_features.title: Create a main restaurant listing page that displays all restaurants in a grid layout with restaurant photos, name, cuisine type, rating display, and price range indicator
Implement search functionality that allows users to search restaurants by name in real-time
Add filter controls for cuisine type, price range, and minimum rating that work together to refine the restaurant list
Create a restaurant detail view that displays full information including address, hours of operation, menu highlights, rating, price range, and cuisine type when a user clicks on a restaurant card

Design a modern, food-focused visual theme with warm, appetizing colors (earth tones, oranges, greens), clean typography, and an inviting layout that emphasizes restaurant imagery and creates a welcoming browsing experience
Render generated restaurant images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated for use in restaurant listings
Add a shopping cart state management system in the frontend that allows users to add menu items, adjust quantities, and view their cart total
Create an order menu section on the RestaurantDetailPage that displays all available items grouped by category with add-to-cart buttons
Create a cart review page or modal that displays all selected items, quantities, individual prices, and total order cost with options to adjust quantities or remove items
Implement a checkout flow that collects delivery address and contact information, then stores the completed order in the backend with order status tracking
Create an order history page where users can view their past orders with order details, status, and restaurant information

new_feature_requests.summary: Quick filters (cuisine type, rating, price range)

Create a restaurant data model in the backend that stores restaurant name, cuisine type, price range (budget/moderate/expensive), rating (1-5 stars), address, hours of operation, and menu highlights as an array of strings
Implement backend methods to add restaurants, get all restaurants, and filter restaurants by cuisine type, price range, and minimum rating
Add an 'orderItems' array field to the Restaurant type in backend/main.mo to store menu items available for ordering, where each item includes a name, description, price, and category
Create backend methods to add items to a restaurant's order menu and retrieve all orderable items for a specific restaurant by restaurant name
